PSCT.Vegas:
① When a Beast-Warrior "Bujin" monster(s) you control is destroyed (by battle/effect) and sent to a GY: 
You can Special Summon this card from your hand. 
② Once per turn, during the End Phase, if a "Bujin" monster(s) was sent from your hand to your GY this turn while you controlled this face-up card: 
You can add 1 "Bujin" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. 
③ You can only control 1 "Bujin Mikazuchi".
PSCT.Meadowlands:
① When a Beast-Warrior "Bujin" monster(s) you control is destroyed (by battle/effect) and sent to a GY:

③ You can only control 1 "Bujin Mikazuchi".
